hints.hint: Its a 3 letter word for a rocky substance
Its just a stupid boulder. Its not just a boulder, its a (3 letter) rock!
An anagram for this answer is: REO.

puzzles.riddle: From mountains high, I shine and gleam; build your cities with my beam.

hints.hint: Its the name of a very popular board Game! (not monopoly)
The settlers vist the vast lands of this island.
The answer starts with the CAT (meow).

contains.name: brick
contains.description: While technically clay found in mines, we call it brick.

objects.objectDescription: A tall and long, brown stained bookshelf sits in the corner of the library.
A desk sits on the back wall of the room, covered in dust and old scriptures.

contains.name: sheep
contains.description: The only and lonely animal of catan.

objects.objectDescription: A treasure chest sits near the front of the room, with its lock rusted open.

contains.name: ore
contains.description: A rocky element from the mountains of catan.

objects.objectDescription: A long table in the center of the library with many chairs to sit and read.

contains.name: wheat
contains.description: A golden source of fuel for you and sheep.

objects.objectDescription: The throne sits in the direct front of the library, like it was made to watch the people coming in and out.
